about.bio: In my perspectives, I am a passionate, enthusiastic programmer with a strong desire for knowledge and challenges. Actively involved with the latest technology and updates in the programming field as well as a fast learner who picks up new skills quickly. I'm self-motivated, versatiled and active, and also a friendly person to make friends with.

extraItems.desc: The most important thing I love and want to stick with is programming. Couldn't stop thinking about digitalizing everything.
Even a hero needs support. Finishing task on my own is really cool, but learning from teammates is something even more.
The curiousity makes me seek for the most effective way to solve any issue, this is also a good chance to challenge myself.
